item.title: Machine Learning to Filter Out Background Noise RTX Voice
item.description: A demo for RTX voice to filter out background noise. If you have a NVIDIA RTX/GTX GPU, utilize it to filter you background in your favorite work from home app. RTX Voice: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/guides/nvidia-rtx-voice-setup-guide/
